data.title: Debris (NBC) First Look at New Sci-Fi TV series
data.meta_description: After weeks of teasing sci-fi fans nationwide, NBC releases 'Debris' Official Sci-Fi trailer.  The new sci-fi TV series that premiered
data.text:
SEOUL, KR — (03-02-21) — After weeks of teasing sci-fi fans nationwide, NBC releases ‘Debris’ Official Sci-Fi trailer. The new sci-fi TV series that premiered on March 1, 2021, was created by J. H. Wyman and stars Jonathan Tucker, Riann Steele, Norbert Leo Butz and Scroobius Pip.

Synopsis:

“When mysterious wreckage starts falling from the sky, a secretive international agency is tasked with figuring out what it is, where it came from, and most importantly… what it can do. British agent Finola Jones and American agent Bryan Beneventi are partners who have very different styles – she’s warm, intuitive and detail-oriented, and he’s charming, confident and guarded. But they have no choice but to trust each other as they track down the debris scattered across the Western Hemisphere.”

The series is produced by Universal Television and Legendary Television.

Watch Debris Official Trailer (2021)

Watch Debris Mondays at 10:00pm/9c on NBC
